```{r setup}
library(DPH)
```

Here is a simulated example which shows you how to use DPH:

```{r example}
sim_data
```

Outcome summary of the simulated data:

```{r table}
tbl <- table(sim_data$time, sim_data$status)
addmargins(tbl)
```

Standard DPH Model

```{r model}
dph(
  time = sim_data$time, 
  status = sim_data$status, 
  pred = sim_data[, -(1:2)]
)
```

## Adjusted DPH Model

```{r}
adph(
  time = sim_data$time, 
  status = sim_data$status, 
  pred = sim_data[, -(1:2)],
  sens = 0.95,
  spec = 0.99
)
```

```{r}
adph(
  time = sim_data$time, 
  status = sim_data$status, 
  pred = sim_data[, -(1:2)],
  sens = seq(0.8, 0.9, 0.025),
  spec = 0.95
)
```
